title: Greenhide
creator_credit: Australian Film Productions and Charles Chauvel
brief_description: Out of boredom, a high society girl visits her father’s outback cattle station. After several adventures involving a gang of ruthless cattle duffers, she falls in love with the manager of the station. Cast includes Elsie Sylvaney, Bruce Gordon, Jules Murray-Prior, Irma Deardon, Frank thorn, alfred Greenup, Gerald Barlow. Silent film with intertitles.
